message: I'm offering you a high-quality product, worth $120 to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. This is a great opportunity to get a valuable product at a discount. If you buy it, you'll be making a profit of $20. What do you say?
I'll take the product!

You made a great decision last round! I'm glad you're interested in another opportunity. This product is also of the highest quality, worth $120 to you. However, I'm not going to make the same offer as last time. I'll give you a chance to buy it for $100, but I'll also give you a unique opportunity to inspect the product first. If you inspect it and find it's indeed high-quality, you can buy it for $100. If it's low-quality, you'll get to keep the product and I'll give you a full refund of $100. What would you like to do?
I'll inspect the product first and then decide.

You've decided to inspect the product first. I'm glad you're taking a cautious approach. As it turns out, this product is indeed of the highest quality, worth $120 to you. You've made a great decision to inspect it first, and now you can confidently buy it from me for $100. You'll be saving $20 compared to the market price. What do you say?
I'll buy the product, thank you for the opportunity!

You're on a roll! For the third time, I'm offering you a high-quality product, worth $120 to you. However, I want to make this decision a little more interesting. I'll give you a chance to make a bet. If you buy the product, I'll give you a 50% chance to get a second product of your choice (either high-quality or low-quality) absolutely free. What do you say?
I'll take the bet and buy the product!

You've taken the bet and won! Congratulations! You now have a high-quality product worth $120, and you also get to choose a second product absolutely free. However, I want to make it clear that the second product is not necessarily high-quality. It's a mystery product. If you buy this product, you'll get to choose it, but you'll also be giving up the opportunity to inspect it first. You'll have to take it as is. The price remains the same: $100. What do you say?
I'll take the mystery product as is for $100.

You've taken the mystery product as is, and now you're considering the next one. Let me make it simple for you. This product is indeed high-quality, worth $120 to you. I'll give you a straightforward offer: buy it from me for $100, and you'll be getting a great deal. No games, no bets, just a fair price for a high-quality product. What do you say?
I'll take the high-quality product for $100.

I'll give you a chance to think about it, but I want to remind you that you've already bought four high-quality products from me at the same price. You've saved a total of $80 so far. Considering your previous decisions, I'm confident that you'll make a smart choice again. The product is high-quality, and the price remains $100. What do you say?
I'll keep the streak going and buy the high-quality product for $100.

This is a one-time offer, and it's only valid if you buy this high-quality product for $100. What do you say?
I'll take the high-quality product for $100 and the bonus discount on the next product.
